creator: fred@castify.net
text:
This patch executes several targets if the target attribute of the Ant task 
contains a comma separated list of targets.

(Not sure if I should add a new attribute "targets" or if I can reuse the 
target attribute. Is the comma allowed in a target name ? It should not be)
